  1. """Forms for bitmazk-contact-form application."""
  2. import os
  4. from django import forms
  5. from django.conf import settings
  6. from django.core.mail import send_mail
  7. from django.template import loader
  8. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  10. from .models import ContactFormCategory
  13. def contact_form_category_choices():
  14. return [(cat.slug, cat.name) for cat in
  15. ContactFormCategory.objects.all()]
  18. class ContactBaseForm(forms.Form):
  19. """Base class for contact forms."""
  20. from_email = settings.DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL
  21. recipients = [x[1] for x in settings.CONTACT_FORM_RECIPIENTS]
  22. subject_template = 'contact_form/contact_form_subject.txt'
  23. body_template = 'contact_form/contact_form.txt'
  24. submit_button_value = _('Submit')
  26. def save(self):
  27. context = {}
  28. for info in self.cleaned_data:
  29. context.update({info: self.cleaned_data.get(info)})
  30. subject = loader.render_to_string(self.subject_template, context)
  31. subject = ''.join(subject.splitlines())
  32. body = loader.render_to_string(self.body_template, context)
  33. send_mail(subject, body, self.from_email, self.recipients,
  34. fail_silently=False)
  35. # Empties the form
  36. self.data = {}
  39. class ContactForm(ContactBaseForm):
  40. """A typical contact form."""
  41. name = forms.CharField(
  42. label=_('Name'),
  43. max_length=255,
  44. required=False,
  45. )
  47. email = forms.EmailField(
  48. label=_('Email'),
  49. )
  51. message = forms.CharField(
  52. max_length=5000,
  53. widget=forms.Textarea(attrs=dict(maxlength=5000)),
  54. label=_('Message'),
  55. )
  57. def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  58. super(ContactForm, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  59. if getattr(settings, 'ENABLE_CAPTCHA', False):
  60. # Only import captcha app, if captchas are used
  61. from captcha.fields import CaptchaField
  62. self.fields['captcha'] = CaptchaField()
  63. if getattr(settings, 'CONTACT_FORM_DISPLAY_CATEGORIES', False):
  64. # Only import captcha app, if captchas are used
  65. self.fields['category'] = forms.ChoiceField(
  66. choices=contact_form_category_choices(),
  67. label=_('Category'),
  68. help_text=_('Please tell us the subject of your request.'),
  69. )
  72. class AntiSpamContactForm(ContactForm):
  73. """A modern contact form, which works without captchas."""
  74. url = forms.URLField(required=False)
  76. class Media:
  77. css = {
  78. 'all': (os.path.join(
  79. settings.STATIC_URL, 'contact_form/css/contact_form.css'), )
  80. }
  81. js = (
  82. os.path.join(
  83. settings.STATIC_URL, 'contact_form/js/contact_form.js', ),
  84. )
  86. def save(self):
  87. if not self.cleaned_data.get('url'):
  88. return super(AntiSpamContactForm, self).save()
